QuestData.Title: Arena Master
QuestData.Description:
There must be more to being a master of the arena than this!
Perhaps the Pirate who runs the event at Gurubashi will know!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Short John Mithril in the Stranglethorn Arena.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Short John Mithril at the Gurubashi Arena in Stranglethorn Vale.
QuestData.RewardText: Arr Me Hearty! Gaining one Trinket be not enough to make ye master of the Arena! Now tis the time to truly prove your steel.
